meanings.sent1: My dad is very dependable; he always picks me up from school on time.
meanings.sent2: Having a dependable friend like Sarah makes life easier.
meanings.sent3: The dependable alarm clock decided to sleep in today!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as dependable as the sunrise, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The dependable old car chugged along, never failing to start.

meanings.sent1: A dependable babysitter is essential for parents who need to go out.
meanings.sent2: She proved to be a dependable witness in court.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot was surprisingly dependable in keeping secrets.
meanings.sent4: His handshake was as dependable as a signed contract.
meanings.sent5: The dependable compass always pointed north, guiding them home.

meanings.sent1: A dependable car will never leave you stranded on the road.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight proved to be a dependable source of light during the blackout.
meanings.sent3: The dependable weatherman predicted sunshine, but it rained instead.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was as dependable as a compass in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The dependable internet connection allowed them to work without interruptions.
